meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she cried when she lost her favorite toy.

meanings.definition: Uttered a loud, inarticulate sound as an expression of pain or distress.
meanings.sent1: The injured player cried out in pain when he fell.
meanings.sent2: She cried out in fear when she saw the spider on her shoulder.
meanings.sent3: The cat cried loudly at the closed door, demanding to be let in.
meanings.sent4: The wind cried through the trees on the stormy night.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house cried with eerie sounds in the darkness.
